description.value:
Frequency once per round

Effect The mockingfey takes on the imperfect, illusory appearance of a creature it can see within 60 feet, pantomiming the mannerisms in a derisive fashion. This illusion doesn't make the mockingfey look any larger and lasts until the end of your next turn.
The creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.master.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is the higher. Regardless of the result, the creature is immune for 1 minute.

Success The creature is unaffected

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{off-guard} until the start of your next turn, as it's distracted by your familiar's taunts.

Critical Failure The creature is off-guard until the end of your next turn
